meanings.definition: A box or jar containing all the evils of the world
meanings.sent1: When she opened the pandora, troubles escaped into the world.
meanings.sent2: The legend warns of the dangers that lie within the pandora.
meanings.sent3: Curiosity led her to open the pandora, releasing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The pandora of problems was opened, and there was no turning back.
meanings.sent5: The pandora held all the world's evils, waiting to be set free.

meanings.definition: A source of unforeseen trouble or disaster
meanings.sent1: The decision to invest in that company turned out to be a pandora.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house became a pandora for the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious package turned out to be a pandora of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Opening the old book unleashed a pandora of unexpected events.
meanings.sent5: The broken vase was a pandora waiting to cause chaos.

meanings.definition: A type of jewelry charm bracelet
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful pandora adorned with charms.
meanings.sent2: The pandora she received as a gift was filled with memories.
meanings.sent3: Her pandora jingled softly as she moved her hand.
meanings.sent4: The pandora on her wrist sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Each charm on her pandora told a different story.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed listening to her favorite songs on pandora.
meanings.sent2: The pandora app recommended new music based on her taste.
meanings.sent3: Pandora played a mix of songs that matched her mood.
meanings.sent4: The pandora playlist was perfect for her road trip.
meanings.sent5: She discovered a new artist through pandora's suggestions.

meanings.sent1: Scientists study the unique features of pandora.
meanings.sent2: Pandora orbits Saturn along with many other moons.
meanings.sent3: The spacecraft captured stunning images of pandora.
meanings.sent4: Pandora's surface reflects the light from Saturn.
meanings.sent5: Exploring pandora's mysteries is a fascinating challenge.
